text:
1. A machine using an electric motor to rotate vanes in order to move air for cooling.
2. A tool whose shape is usually long triangle or semicircle is made of feathers, leaves, paper, cloth, etc. people usually wave it lightly in a hand to create a cooling current of air.
Various types of fans and their characteristics
Origin of fans.
The fans making history are at least 3,000 years, and the earliest fans can date from 3000 BC according to the record. Fans originated in China. The first European folding fans were brought into hat.
Fans make you cold not to much
